item.description:
There is perhaps no better way to spend a lazy Sunday afternoon than by taking a leisurely stroll on the grounds of a well-maintained botanical garden, which is what the arboretum is. In addition to an impressive variety of nurtured plants, the arboretum serves as nesting (and spotting) grounds for an array of birds.

We'll meet at the Forest Hills gate (the one closest to the subway). Admission is free.

Where: Arnold Arboretum, Forest Hills gate
Cost: None
Info: http://www.arboretum....
Reviews: http://www.yelp.com/b...
item.name: Arnold Arboretum
